scripts.start: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.dev node loadEnv.js && expo start --dev-client
scripts.ios:dev: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.dev node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && expo run:ios
scripts.android:dev: node ./scripts/deleteAndroid.js && cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.dev node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && expo run:android
scripts.android:preview: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.preview node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && expo run:android
scripts.android:production: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.production node loadEnv.js expo prebuild --clean && expo run:android
scripts.ios: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.dev expo prebuild --clean && expo run:ios
scripts.internal:build:ios: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.internal node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p ios --profile internal
scripts.dev:build:android: rimraf android && dotenv -e .env.dev -- node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.dev -- expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile developmentInternal
scripts.dev:fresh:build:android: rimraf android && dotenv -e .env.fresh.dev -- node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.fresh.dev -- expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile freshDevelopmentInternal
scripts.preview:build: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.preview node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile preview
scripts.preview:build:android: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.preview node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile preview
scripts.preview:build:ios: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.preview node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p ios --profile preview
scripts.preview:build:all: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.preview node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p all --profile preview
scripts.prod:build:android: rimraf android && dotenv -e .env.production -- node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.production -- expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile production
scripts.prod:build:ios: rimraf ios && dotenv -e .env.production -- node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.production -- expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p ios --profile production
scripts.prod:build:all: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.production node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p all --profile production
scripts.prodInternal:build:android: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.production node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p android --profile productionInternal
scripts.prodInternal:build:ios: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.production node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p ios --profile productionInternal
scripts.prodInternal:build:all: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.production node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p all --profile productionInternal
scripts.build:all: node loadEnv.js && expo prebuild --clean && eas build -p all
scripts.update:preview: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.preview node loadEnv.js && eas update --branch preview --profile preview
scripts.android: cross-env ENV_FILE=.env.dev node loadEnv.js && expo run:android
scripts.credentials:dev: dotenv -e .env.dev node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.dev eas credentials
scripts.credentials:prod: dotenv -e .env.production node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.production eas credentials
scripts.submit: dotenv -e .env.production node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.production eas submit
scripts.update:prod: dotenv -e .env.production node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.production eas update
scripts.update:dev: dotenv -e .env.dev node loadEnv.js && dotenv -e .env.dev eas update
